content:
A Note on Technical Report Availability

Some of my papers have been published as ICS departmental technical reports. Unfortunately, the ICS department technical report web server is never up. If the report you want is not already available from my publications page, send me an email with the title and I'll try to dig up a copy for you.

David Eppstein -- Theory Group -- Inf. & Comp. Sci. -- UC Irvine
